setBet(int) - Method in class Player
Set the player's bet amount
setCard(int, Card) - Method in class Deck
Specifies the card at a given position by exchanging cards.
setCard(int, Card) - Method in class Hand
Sets a specified card of this hand.

Set the player's name
setQuality(Quality) - Method in class Hand
Setter for hand's quality
show() - Method in class Hand
Displays a visual representation of this hand on System.out.
show(int) - Method in class Hand
Displays a visual representation of the first cards of this hand on System.out.
showAll() - Method in class Deck
Returns string representation of every card in this deck and in the order they appear in the deck.
shuffle() - Method in class Deck
Performs a simple shuffle by exchanging cards.
size() - Method in class Deck
Returns the number of Cards in this Deck.
sort() - Method in class Hand
Sorts this hand by ascending card rank; ignores suit.
suit() - Method in class Card
Accesses the suit of this card.
Suit - Enum in <Unnamed>
Enumeration class for the suits of cards.
